Vocab-English: To Live (To reside or stay in a certain place)

Sentence-English: Last night I stayed at home and watched TV.
Are they a friend of yours? (Alt: Is he/is she)
How long have you been married?
Are they going to get divorced?
Her birthday is coming up soon.

Sentence: 다음 주 토요일이 우리 아버지의 환갑이다
Sentence-English: Next Saturday is my father's 60th birthday.
